name: Wastelanders Remastered Remastered
description:
A new global war has arise. It is a battle between Communism and Capitalism. You (a US Spy) is tasked with spreading democracy.  There are a variety of historical, current and future weapons to play with and  there are 3 levels and each level the sabotaging will be longer and even difficult. All of these factors made Wastelanders Remastered Remastered best First Person Shooter game ever to be released on itch.io. Note: this game will be used just as prototype testing for our future game mechanics.

Wastelanders Remastered Remastered is a remastered version of the original Wastelanders made with Unreal Engine. This game contains better graphics, new and better guns, and more challenging and fun levels. Enjoy!

How to install the game:

1. Download the game

2. Right click on the zip file

3. Click on Extract All...

4. Click on the Wastelanders Remastered Remastered.exe file. If there's a warning bar pop up then click on more info and then click on run anyway

Enjoy the game!
